Title: The Sweet Hereafter
Production_Co: Alliance Communications Corporation, Ego Film Arts, Téléfilm Canada
Cast: Ian Holm, Caerthan Banks, Sarah Polley, Tom McCamus, Gabrielle Rose, Alberta Watson, Maury Chaykin, Stephanie Morgenstern, Kirsten Kieferle, Arsinée Khanjian, Earl Pastko, Simon Baker, David Hemblen, Bruce Greenwood, Sarah Rosen Fruitman
Plot: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems. A small community is torn apart by a tragic accident which kills most of the town's children. A lawyer visits the victims' parents in order to profit from the tragedy by stirring up the their anger and launching a class action suit against anyone they can blame. The community is paralyzed by its anger and cannot let go. All but one young girl, left in a wheelchair after the accident, who finds the courage to lead the way toward healing. Written by Matthew Tichenor <mticheno@direct.ca>
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 33 wins & 52 nominations.
Actors: Ian Holm, Sarah Polley, Caerthan Banks
